website_summaries.verdict: Practical and fun, this affordable case and track makes an ideal gift or the perfect addition to a youngster's toy car collection.
pros: Generates enthusiasm for being both a toy car storage case and racer in one, thanks to the dual launchers and dual race tracks
cons: Tracks are fairly short, and storage compartment doesn't hold a lot of cars

customer_reviews.title: The hottest toy! Hot Wheels !!
customer_reviews.text: What a cool toy!! My grandson loved it ! It was the "hit" toy for his birthday party . Something about a case , race track & cars that shoot off the start ! Highly recommended by a friend who bought this for her grandsons. The grandfathers each told memories of their Hot Wheels ! Great time had by all .
customer_reviews.author: T. J. McClure

customer_reviews.title: thanks hot wheels!
customer_reviews.text: my 4 yr old son received this for christmas. i think it's an awesome toy - not too expensive, and we dont have miles of tracks to set up for playtime. i love that it can carry his favorites along for vacation or play dates. he was a little frustrated with how hard it is to push back the rubber band launcher, but after some practice, he's got it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Great start to track building or just fun on its own
customer_reviews.text: This set kickstarted my daughters' (5 and 8) Hotwheels track setup and was a great way to do it. The nice part about this launcher is that both cars fire with the push of the button, and it is handy to find some cars in when you close it up. We started with this set and some straight track and it has already grown with multiple loops and turns. It has been a HUGE hit whenever friends and family come over.
customer_reviews.author: Keith I

customer_reviews.title: Happy toddler
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost 3 years old and is in the trains, cars, trucks, airplanes stage. We were at a friends house and her son has the big 8-lane race track (something like that) and he totally loved it. I honestly didn’t want to spend about $80 on it so I decided to get this. I am glad I got this because he really enjoys it, as do my 8 and 10 year old kiddos. I love that it is compact and you can take it on the go! It holds about 6-8 cars inside the little box too 👍🏻. I would buy this again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: A. TorresTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Fun travel and travel size
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my new favorite travel toy. It came with 2 hot wheel cars and can carry up to 12 cars. Its a little hard for my 3 year old to pull back, but his older brother (9) helps him. Suprisingly both boys enjoy this toy and have fun raceing each other. It comes with 2 short tracks that are compatible with other hot wheels tracks but honestly my boys enjoy it with out.
customer_reviews.author: Boy mom

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set, and my 4 year old daughter is loving it!! Not only does it launch 2 cars at the same time for great races, but it also works as a perfect little storage box for 12 of her cars (and could probably fit a couple more on top). Looking forward to getting her some additional track to attach to this.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: A Great lil Hot Wheel set of two cars and tracks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Hot Wheel set for my 3 year old grandson. I thought this would be a Great toy for him when traveling or camping. He really Enjoys playing with Hot Wheels. I previously bought him the Hot Wheel traveling storage which he ❤️‘S! I’d recommend buying this little set and other Hot Wheel items from Amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 yo
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Xmas. We played with it for a couple hours. I bought him the straight track set you can get on Amazon for about $10. This was awesome. My son had trouble pushing the button. But would collect the cars and put them in the lanes. Then I would push the button. Repeat. We tried “racing” all his cars to find out which were the fastest. Great fun.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper5

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Fun.  Nice transport box.
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Easy to use. Fun. Can attach to other sets. Can use the box for transport and hold other cars as well. Mostly preassembled--which is nice for the adults in the house. Was a hit on Christmas morning for the 5 1/2 year old after he understood that it took both hand to pull back the trigger mechanism and off he went racing off and on all morning long! Per the box: Made in China. Vehicle Made in China, Malaysia or Thailand as marked.
customer_reviews.author: GAMS Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Childhood memories
customer_reviews.text: My brother and I both collected Hot Wheels! I’m a girl and I loved setting up the tracks with my brother. We would take over the whole dinning room for weeks! I brought it to Christmas and challenged him to a race! Winner takes &5.00!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was my sons intro into hot wheels track, since until now he was all about trains. He loves this set. He and his dad and cousin love to put on races and video them on iPhone to see the “photo finish”. Seems to fit pretty much any toy metal car.
customer_reviews.author: M. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year-old grandson liked this a lot. It is small and compact, has a handle to carry it by. I thought it would be a good toy for graveling with and taking to our house if he wants to. I also bought one for an anonymous gift to a needy 4 year-old boy through our church, but added the extra track pieces for him (such a great price). There was also room to stuff 2 more Hot Wheels cars into it.
customer_reviews.author: Tess A.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for kids that doesn’t take up too much room. I decided to purchase it for my son after another child I was babysitting played with it for hours. Great to play with and also store hotwheels.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: compact and ideal for taking on the go
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy. he loves that he can carry multiple cars in the case and play when we go somewhere he may not be entertained. The price has increased dramatically in the past few months. I'm guessing because of popularity. But I've purchased this as a gift for many little boys because it's so great.
customer_reviews.author: albita77

customer_reviews.title: Car Shooter (Better for Smaller Kids)
customer_reviews.text: Pro, a lot easier for smaller kids to use that the ones you pull back, and it shoots two cars out. Con, the design is poor IMO, half gets pulled back, and the top goes to the side, your adding more break points than needed.
customer_reviews.author: TexasInvasion

customer_reviews.title: Good travel case and launcher
customer_reviews.text: Compact. Need more tracks for racing, but works well. The lock/closure is a little complicated for a 3 year old, as is flipping it open and getting flat to race. But overall good -would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyl M

customer_reviews.title: Hot Wheels - The best tracks for the game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this branded set and it has been used by my children for almost 2 years. Everything is solid and Very exciting. Boy 4 years copes well and loves to play with his sister (8 years). You can use any of the cars Hot Wheels 1:64, to arrange competitions and to follow - which one is faster will come. Different models of cars come in different ways. Inside the case you can put 8 - 12 cars, close the case on the latch and go with this track to visit (there is a convenient handle). On photo - track, which we play more, than year and a half. Recommend! Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: DDV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Toy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 6 year old for an upcoming trip. He was able to pack enough cars and the tracks that were included inside the small case. He loves it! We have a single car launcher but this lets two cars race so it is more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Janine M

customer_reviews.title: we loved this "Hot Wheels Case Track" set so much
customer_reviews.text: As grandparents, we loved this "Hot Wheels Case Track" set so much, we bought two more. This set is so compact, it's good for at home or any outing. Boy and girls alike enjoy the excitement & versatility of this little set. My children learned early; taking turns can be fun. The only thing I found I needed to purchase extra, were spare cars (so each child had their own). We love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can be modified for more speed
customer_reviews.text: We like to add more speed when we race Hot Wheels so we look for launchers that allow you to replace the rubber band. If you switch to a shorter, stronger rubber band you can get fantastic speed down a 15-20-foot strip of track.
customer_reviews.author: Ultramagnetic74

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel & home!
customer_reviews.text: My nearly 3 yr old son absolutely ADORES this. He figured out how to pull back the launcher a few days after Christmas and since then it's been played with constantly. They shoot out quite far so I'm looking forward to add some tracks as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: Lost spring, hard for young children to close
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for the first week. My three-year-old son would have difficulty closing the case as it must be closed and a certain way. Also, after the first week the spring for the spring action part of the toy broke off and we were not able to find it again. It was fun while it lasted!
customer_reviews.author: uuboy13

customer_reviews.title: Cool carrying case
customer_reviews.text: We saw this at Kohls and they had it for almost $20 so checked amazon for it. Ordered for my 2 yr old that is obsessed with cars and I love that he can carry some cars with him and keep them all in one place. It did come broken so we cant attach one side of the track but other then that it works and he loves it :)
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa

customer_reviews.title: Kid powered!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson (3) loves this. So do we and his parents. Simple, no batteries, easy to use and so much fun. Works on its own or with a race track. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: 1had2comment

customer_reviews.title: but fun set. Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Simple, but fun set. Perfect for travel. Average age using is 4 years old, able to set up and operate without assistance. Kids have a blast racing and crashing into play courses built with blocks. Not all cars work well with the set, some are much slower. Cars that came with set were dubbed "cool" and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely not purchase this again. Very cheap, the tracks didn't 'snap' or hold into place. Just takes up space. My 2.5 yr. old wants nothing to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my nephew who is really into hot wheels right now. He absolutely loves it. Cares it with him whenever he goes since he's able to store a few cars in it and also unfold it and use the track to play.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fig.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and has spent hours making different tracks. We got the turns package with this for more creative fun. I do wish that it came with a loop though.
customer_reviews.author: Slotmans

customer_reviews.title: Fast launcher
customer_reviews.text: Very fast with a lot of distance. The button is too hard for my son to push it by himself so we have to push it together
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle DePalma

customer_reviews.title: Stay behind cars when released.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but the cars, dart out so fast that it’s dangerous. Packs up to a nice carrying case, but would not recommend using this for smaller children. Must stay clear or behind cars when released. I would recommend a traditional track vs. this particular mini racing set.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson started playing with this right away with other hotwheels sets he got for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma RO

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for something that could travel well and hold up and this is it. I have lots or hot wheels and my kids always want to being them and this case allowed for that and a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: Neffer-2013

customer_reviews.title: This set is a great addition to my son's Hot Wheels track-builder set
customer_reviews.text: This set is a great addition to my son's Hot Wheels track-builder set. He loves it and has filled it with cars and taken it everywhere the past few days. He even opened it and built a small set on the floor at the DMV. Win!
customer_reviews.author: eemerson

customer_reviews.title: Mother of four recommends!
customer_reviews.text: A year later and my two year old son still plays with this daily. Super Saturday and incredibly fun!
customer_reviews.author: Manager of Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: As described; perfect for patio or deck
customer_reviews.text: We're using it for a deck roof as ambience lighting - but it's bright enough to light up the outside at night without being overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Steele

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Ok little hard for my 4 year old to push the button put he will get use to it, good addition to his hot wheels
customer_reviews.author: christopher pizzo

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: Too many cheap pieces my son tossed it all in the trash
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Its ok, not great not bad either.
customer_reviews.text: Product is a bit flimsy, but functional. The tracks themselves are worse in quality than the old tracks, and the launchers are not as sturdy as in prior hot wheels track products. Price reflects this, so its an average product.
customer_reviews.author: Neal NYC

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy to grab and take with you. It's easy to put together, take apart and store. My nephew plays for hours at a time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Send it
customer_reviews.text: Great launcher! The three different launch “stages” work pretty well, the button is a bit stiff and my 2 year old can’t press it down, yet. Stage 3 really sends it!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is our go to gift when ever my son gets invited to a birthday party. Great price and it's always a huge hit.

customer_reviews.title: ❤❤❤
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old loves it!!! And it has held up to some rough play!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great starter for a 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his birthday. He was so excited and engaged with the track set. He wanted everyone to play with him. He has dozens of cars so it will keep is Hot Wheels obsession alive for quite some time.

customer_reviews.title: shipped super quick.
customer_reviews.text: A good quality toy. There will be many hours of fun waiting to be had with this race track set.

customer_reviews.title: Super cool little car carrier
customer_reviews.text: Super cool little car carrier. Bought as a birthday gift for my 4 y/o nephew and his older brother nd dad had just as much fun with it as he did!!!

customer_reviews.text: This case is a great launcher, and depending on how you put the cars in, can hold about a dozen cars. You will need to buy some track for this.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a little race fan's hands
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 3 year old Grandson for Christmas. He loves it! Yes, it is small, but it is a travel case for small children so that's perfect! It came with 2 bright hotwheel cars to race with. It only includes 2 short pieces of orange track, they are just long enough to launch the cars off for a race. This does shoot them off quick! It's easy for a 3 year old to operate and kept him busy for quite some time. I am pleased because I can add onto this for many years and he and his Daddy were both having a great time. ;)

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for little enthusiasts.

We all appreciate that it can hold additional cars, and compacts down to the size of a small tackle box. Dad also likes that the mechanism appears easy to repair--a rubber beneath the actual launcher, accessible from underneath the track itself.

product_meta.title: Hot Wheels Race Case Track Set
product_meta.description: Race and rank your favorite Hot Wheels cars! The Hot Wheels Race Case lets kids store their collection of vehicles and then launch them into amped up racing action. Which vehicles have what it takes to win the showdown Which one from your entire collection will be the ultimate winner The Race Case offers side-by-side racing action and positions to rank their four fastest cars. Moms will love that the Race Case is fully portable and even features a carrying handle so it’s easy to take along on trips. There’s also storage space underneath the launcher to pack away additional cars and track. Connect to more orange track or to other Hot Wheels track sets (sold separately) for tons of exciting, stunting fun! Comes with a built-in dual launcher, two pieces of track and two Hot Wheels vehicles. Each sold separately, subject to availability.
feature_bullets: Race and rank favorite Hot Wheels vehicles
Dual launcher for side-by-side racing showdowns
Places for displaying their four fastest cars with handy storage underneath
Connects with other Hot Wheels tracks (sold separately) to build your racing world
